title: Adapter-Hub subtask definition
description: Defines a specific subtask describing the dataset the corresponding modules where trained on.

task.description: The short identifier of the task this subtask belongs to.

subtask.description: The short identifier of this subtask.

displayname.description: The full name of the subtask that should be displayed e.g. on the website.

description.description: A short description of this subtask (max. 500 chars).

url.description: A URL pointing to more information on this subtask.

citation.description: A bibtex citation of the work related to this subtask.

language.description: The identifier of the language of the data in this subtask

metric.description: The default evaluation metric of this subtask.
